name: Death Damnation
description:
United States, an unprecedented pandemic crisis leads to the rise of misery and unemployment. Directly impacted by the situation, you are urgently looking for a new job. Your caring neighbour sends you a job ad to be filled quickly. You end up accepting this offer out of spite, becoming the new graveyard keeper since the position suddenly became vacant.

You leap at the chance to change your day-to-day. It is your first night at the cemetery in this cursed world, and everything goes wrong. The dead rise from their graves, and ghosts of the past wander everywhere. Surrounded by a heavy fog, it seems that you cannot escape this place. What is behind the evil in this place ? How are you going to change the ongoing apocalypse ? It's not just the future of your family that rests on your shoulders, but the whole world.

EXPLORE THE PARALLEL WORLD





Explore the Parallel World as the Graveyard Keeper. Leave no place untouched. From the Keeper’s House to the Church, each location in Death Damnation has its purpose in this nightmare.

SCAVENGE AND CRAFT TO SURVIVE”





Grab everything you deem essential. Death will not allow you to return to your life before, and the nightmare will begin again.

Throughout your exploration, evil lurks at every corner. Horrible creatures and the risen dead haunt the Parallel world. Scavenge locations and graveyards for supplies, craft weaponry to defend yourself. Every creature has its own unique weakness, find and exploit them. Learn from your predecessors, as their notes will be invaluable. Be Careful to follow Sacred Laws of God.

INSPIRATIONS AND POLONIUM STUDIO'S VISION



Death Damnation is a hardcore FPS survival horror game influenced by games such as SCP Containment Breach, Resident Evil, Silent Hill, Phasmophobia, and Dark Souls. We strive to create a new experience in survival horror games, where you find out how to kill paranormal entities and solve mysteries within the Parallel World.
